app_metadata.description: Lightweight universal DDNS Updater with web UI
app_metadata.name: ddns-updater

run_as_context.description: DDNS Updater runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: DDNS Updater

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for DDNS Updater

attrs.label: Update Period
attrs.description:
Default period of IP address check, following this format:</br>
5m = 5 minutes</br>
1h = 1 hour</br>
1h30m = 1 hour 30 minutes

attrs.label: Update Cooldown Period
attrs.description:
Duration to cooldown between updates for each record.
This is useful to avoid being rate limited or banned,
following this format:</br>
5m = 5 minutes</br>
1h = 1 hour</br>
1h30m = 1 hour 30 minutes

attrs.label: Backup Period
attrs.description:
Set to a period to enable zip backups of data/config.json and
data/updates.json in a zip file following this format:</br>
0 = disabled</br>
10h = 10 hours</br>
20h30m = 20 hours 30 minutes

attrs.label: HTTP Timeout
attrs.description:
Default timeout for HTTP requests, following this format:</br>
10s = 10 seconds</br>
1m = 1 minute</br>
1m30s = 1 minute 30 seconds

attrs.label: Public IP DNS Timeout
attrs.description:
Public IP DNS query timeout, following this format:</br>
3s = 3 seconds</br>
1m = 1 minute</br>
1m30s = 1 minute 30 seconds

attrs.label: Shoutrrr Addresses
attrs.description:
List of Shoutrrr addresses to send notifications to.</br>
See https://containrrr.dev/shoutrrr/0.7/services/overview/ for more information.

attrs.label: Public IP DNS Providers
attrs.description: Providers to obtain the public IP address (IPv4 and/or IPv6)

attrs.label: Public IP HTTP Providers
attrs.description: Providers to obtain the public IP address (IPv4 and/or IPv6)

attrs.label: Public IPv4 HTTP Providers
attrs.description: Providers to obtain the public IPv4 address

attrs.label: Public IPv6 HTTP Providers
attrs.description: Providers to obtain the public IPv6 address

attrs.label: Public IP Fetchers
attrs.description: Fetcher types to obtain the public IP address

attrs.label: Config
attrs.description: Configure DDNS Updater.

attrs.label: Provider
attrs.description: The provider to use for DDNS Updater.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description:
Domain </br>
For example:</br>
- example.com</br>
- *.example.com</br>
- sub.example.com</br>

attrs.label: Host (Deprecated)
attrs.description:
DEPRECATED. Use Domain field instead.</br>
It will be removed in the near future.

attrs.label: IP Version
attrs.description:
IP Version. </br>
For example: IPv4

attrs.label: Zone ID
attrs.description: You can find it in the Overview tab of your domain.

attrs.label: TTL
attrs.description:
1 = Automatic </br>
600 = 10 minutes

attrs.label: Proxied
attrs.description:
True = Proxied </br>
False = DNS Only

attrs.label: Token
attrs.description: You can find it in the Overview tab of your domain.

attrs.label: User Service Key
attrs.description: You can find it in the Overview tab of your domain.

attrs.label: Email
attrs.description: You can find it in the Overview tab of your domain.

attrs.label: API Key
attrs.description: You can find it in the Overview tab of your domain.

attrs.label: Dual Stack
attrs.description:
True = Dual Stack </br>
False = IPv4 Only

attrs.label: API Key (Deprecated)
attrs.description: Use Personal Access Token instead.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that DDNS Updater files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that DDNS Updater files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: DDNS Updater Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store DDNS Updater Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Containers
attrs.description: Containers where the label should be applied

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for DDNS Updater.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for DDNS Updater.

1.2.8.readme:
DDNS Updater

DDNS Updater is a lightweight universal DDNS Updater with web UI
